name: Gymkhana
description: Tandoor oven roasts, sigri charcoal grills and seasonal curries at Raj-era themed Indian restaurant.

reviews.author: ant foulds
reviews.comment: Fabulous Indian food. Had the 5 course tasting menu, there was plenty. Couldn't fault the service or the food. Would definitely go back.

reviews.author: Graham Hine
reviews.comment: Great service and food. Had one of their signature gin and tonics. Excellent. The food was delicious. I let the waiter recommend an appetizer and main, both delicious and well presented.

reviews.author: Haamid
reviews.comment: Great food, staff make efforts but all coming in contact with guests lack experience and maturity. Average age well below 30. Over confidence that may be a risk it faces.

reviews.author: Sarah
reviews.comment: Reading the mixed reviews before we went for dinner I wasn't sure what to expect. But fantastic flavours and the charming staff made this an amazing night! Try the tasting menu, it is the best way to sample all the best things on the menu. I'll be back soon.

reviews.author: Michelle
reviews.comment: Overpriced and over hyped. Cocktails are also not worth the fuss. Food is good but price it's questionable.
